trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_SEQ_00<tab>Sphene is resolved to take part in the coming battle.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Gossan in the government sector.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Sphene.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Y'shtola at leynode mnemo.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_GULOOLJA_000_001<tab>Shale has been out of sorts ever since we got back. I don't think she liked what Calyx said... But don't worry, I'll do my best to cheer her up!
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_KRILE_000_005<tab>I've passed on the short version of events to our comrades so that we can all prepare for the challenge ahead.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_WUKLAMAT_000_010<tab>It's time to put an end to this. Calyx won't stop until <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> stop him.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ERENVILLE_000_015<tab>The situation isn't the best out there... But at least you've come back to us safe and sound.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_SHALE_000_020<tab>It's a shame that punching an Endless does no damage. I'd love to rearrange that serene face of his...
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... We've briefed Erenville on everything that has happened and sent word to the others.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_100_030<tab>We've now but to consider what our next actions will be.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_031<tab>Calyx has offered you the opportunity to confront him directly...

TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_100_031<tab>And though it feels much like striding face-first into an ambush, we have little choice. If we are to destroy the memories he supposedly has stored in the upper reaches of the Meso Terminal, then that is where we must go.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_SHALE_110_031<tab>While I'm still upset at being deprived of my moment, I nevertheless did my due diligence...
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_SHALE_120_031<tab>I can confirm that the relay we found was indeed transmitting surveillance data to a device somewhere in Living Memory.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_032<tab>When you go to fight Calyx, pray let me fight alongside you.

TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_033<tab>Let me fight for the memory of Otis and Zelenia, and for the other Sphene I may have become. But most importantly, for my beloved kingdom and a joyful tomorrow!
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_A1_000_001<tab>It has always been your fight as much as ours, if not more.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_A1_000_002<tab>Of course, but no reckless heroics!
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_A1_000_003<tab>If things take a grim turn, I'll keep you safe.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_035<tab>Thank you for understanding what this means to me.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_036<tab>Yes, I understand. I promise not to subject myself or the party to needless danger.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_037<tab>I shall hold you to that. But I will also protect you in turn...because that is what comrades do.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_WUKLAMAT_000_038<tab>I'll be coming with you, as well. You know my reasons.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_KRILE_000_039<tab>It hardly needs saying, but your fellow Scions also have every intention of accompanying you into battle.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_KRILE_000_040<tab>So adamant were Alisaie and the others on this point that they have already left for Living Memory. I am more than ready to do the same.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ERENVILLE_000_041<tab>I'll keep patrolling the streets for signs of trouble─especially from anyone wearing neo regulators.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_SHALE_000_042<tab>Should you need anything from me, I'll be on standby here in the Backroom.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_GULOOLJA_000_043<tab>I really want to go with you too, but I know I can't. I know that sometimes you have to be patient and trust in your friends.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_WUKLAMAT_000_044<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Krile and I think that we should talk to Gossan before we leave for Living Memory.

TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_WUKLAMAT_000_045<tab>Under Calyx's direction, Preservation has helped shape Alexandria's society for centuries. Taking him down will have serious consequences, and we need to warn the officials in charge about what we intend.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_046<tab>Justifications aside, we shall be acting against the wishes of all who desire to become Endless...
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_WUKLAMAT_000_047<tab>Exactly. We don't know if Gossan will approve or oppose our chosen course, but either way, leaving without a word is the wrong thing to do.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_048<tab>Come, we should be on our way. Resolution first, yes?
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_GULOOLJA_000_049<tab>Be safe, everyone! We'll see you when it's over!
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_SHALE_000_050<tab>As I said, I'll be ready and waiting if and when you have need of me. Just make sure you come back in one piece.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_GULOOLJA_000_055<tab>I'll do whatever I can to help Shale and Erenville. It may not be much, but small things add up when you do enough of them!
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_060<tab>Government officials must be fielding demands from all quarters. I do not envy Gossan his position.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_WUKLAMAT_000_065<tab>I see Gossan's wearing a neo regulator. He'll have some thoughts to share on the subject, I'll wager...
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_KRILE_000_070<tab>The air is thick with a sense of unease─not least around Gossan himself.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ERENVILLE_000_075<tab>Even people from my village have taken to wearing neo regulators. I can only hope it doesn't end badly...
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_GOSSAN_000_080<tab>It is a relief to be freed from my indecision. Until I had removed my regulator, I hadn't realized quite how heavy it weighed upon me.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_WUKLAMAT_000_085<tab>Sphene must be overjoyed to be so welcomed by her countrymen. For their sakes, we need to bring her back safely.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_KRILE_000_090<tab>I'm glad we were able to hear the will of the Alexandrian people. Now it falls to us to see the rest of it through!
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_STRIKA_000_095<tab>Hello, remember me? The hunter from the Thunderyards? It's been a while, but we met when you first arrived in the dome.

TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_STRIKA_000_096<tab>We've been talking with Lithander and the others and, thanks to some very convincing arguments, we've come around to the idea that we need to start taking responsibility for the future of our nation.

TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_STRIKA_000_097<tab>There are those like us who rely on regulators for their work, and others who aren't quite ready to give up what they have...but we all share a desire to make things better.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_100<tab>Everyone was so warm and welcoming. Alexandrians are, as ever, a stalwart people.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_101<tab>How glad I am to be home...
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_WUKLAMAT_000_102<tab>Thank you, Gossan. That decision must have been difficult to make.

TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_GOSSAN_000_103<tab>If only I could claim the courage to do so came from within. The final push came from Alexandria's citizens, and their bravery in taking the first step towards change.

TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_WUKLAMAT_000_104<tab>Speaking of which, can I ask you to lock that neo regulator away where no one can get to it? That should prevent the registrations from reaching the target number.

TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_GOSSAN_000_105<tab>I should be glad to do so, but I fear it would be to no avail. According to our most recent surveys, the number of neo regulators in circulation exceeds the stated five thousand.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_GOSSAN_000_106<tab>I surmise the surplus units are to account for those like myself who have had a change of heart, or are otherwise hesitant to register.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_WUKLAMAT_000_107<tab>Ah... That does sound like something Calyx would do. Well, we'll have to face him either way, so no point in delaying the inevitable. On to Living Memory!
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ALPHINAUD_000_110<tab>'Tis good to rejoin you all. I needed to step away briefly that I might make arrangements for a certain precautionary measure...
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ALISAIE_000_115<tab>Last time I had to wait in the cenote, but there's nothing to stop me from joining this fight!
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_GRAHATIA_000_120<tab>We've all been so busy, it seems an age since last we gathered in such a manner. I must say, we do make for a formidable group!
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_KRILE_000_125<tab>Coming here reminds me of my parents. Of the courage they gave me...
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_WUKLAMAT_000_130<tab>Seems Alphinaud and Alisaie were the ones to explain to Koana our need to enter the cenote. He urged us to be extremely careful, of course!
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_135<tab>I had scarcely awakened here when I fell unconscious. Now that I can fully enjoy the gentle silence of this place, it brings tears to my eyes.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_YSHTOLA_000_140<tab>Ah, 'tis good to see our comrades hale and girded for battle.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_YSHTOLA_000_141<tab>As for us, we've been ahead to inspect the lay of the land. There were no changes of note...aside from with the Meso Terminal itself.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_WUKLAMAT_000_142<tab>Why, what's happened to the Meso Terminal?

TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_YSHTOLA_000_143<tab>The wall has receded to provide a convenient entrance into the structure's interior. There was no such ingress when last we were here, so we must assume that Calyx has since manipulated the terminal's electrope.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_YSHTOLA_000_144<tab>All to facilitate his most gracious invitation to the upper levels.
TEXT_KINGMI107_05370_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_145<tab>An invitation I am eager to accept... For the sake of all who love Alexandria, I will not yield nor leave them to despair.
